component.description: DataList is an enhanced version of the standard jQuery Mobile DataList that includes support for offline synchronization.
component.attributes:
&widget_var_attribute;
paginatorTemplate false java.lang.String {PreviousPageLink} {CurrentPageReport} {NextPageLink} Template of the paginator.
selectAction false java.lang.Object JavaScript expression to invoke when the user taps a list item.
swipeLeftAction false java.lang.String Function accepting a list row as an argument to be invoked on swipe left.
swipeRightAction false java.lang.String Function accepting a list row as an argument to be invoked on swipe right.
itemContextMenu false java.lang.String ID of a popup to display when the user executes the context action on a list item.
itemContextMenuFilter false java.lang.String Function accepting a single argument, a row record, and returning true if the context menu should be attached.
holdAction false java.lang.String JavaScript expresssion to invoke when the user executes the context action on a list item.
condition false java.lang.String JavaScript expression that, if true, means the table should be rendered and, if false, means the table should be hidden.
itemList true java.lang.String JavaScript expression that evaluates to a PersistenceJS QueryCollection of objects, each of which corresponds to one row in the table.
itemsPerPage false java.lang.String Number of items to display on each page. If this argument is omitted, then no pagination is used.
rowRenderer true java.lang.String Java script expression that renders a single row of data. Parameters are the parentDiv (enclosing the row) and the row (the row data).
emptyMessage false java.lang.String No records found. Text to display when there is no data to display. Default is "No records found."
emptyGroupMessage false java.lang.String There are no items to display in this group. Text to display when there is no data to display in a group. Default is 'There are no items to display in this group.'
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the main container.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container.
listStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the list.
rowStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class for each row.
dividerStyleClass false java.lang.String Style class for each divider row in a grouped list.
sortBy false java.lang.Object Object field(s) to be used for default sorting.
sortOrder false java.lang.String ascending Sets sorting order. Default is "ascending"
onSort false java.lang.String Callback to invoke on sort. Accepts the field and sort order as arguments.
doThisFilter false java.lang.String Callback to invoke to filter the list based on the currently selected item. Accepts the current query collection, the sort field, and the selected row as arguments. Returns the filtered query collection.
doGlobalFilter false java.lang.String Callback to invoke to filter the list based on a specific field and value. Accepts the current query collection, the sort field, and the selected value as arguments. Returns the filtered query collection.
grouped false java.lang.Boolean false Is this a grouped list? Default is false.
groupName false java.lang.String false Function to invoke on a row to get the group name in a grouped list.
groupMembers false java.lang.String false Function to invoke on a row to get the group members in a grouped list.
strings false java.lang.String List of strings to supply to the renderer. Useful for internationalizing boilerplate text via JSF.
type false java.lang.String Set to inset to get the jQuery mobile inset appearance.
indexedSearch false java.lang.String Enables free text search. Supply a function that accepts two arguments, the search query and a query collection, and returns a filtered query collection.
onSearchClear false java.lang.String Function name to invoke on search clear. This function accepts no arguments, but the datalist is the this variable.
indexedSearchText false java.lang.String Provide explanatory text to place in the search bix when it is first rendered.
indexedSearchType false java.lang.String Set to search to have a stylized search box. All other settings yield a plain text box.
scrollContents false java.lang.Boolean true Indicate if the contents of the list should be scrollable.
splitIcon false java.lang.String Specify if a split icon will be used in the list elements.
splitTheme false java.lang.String b Specify the theme of the split element.
headerText false java.lang.String Specify text to appear in a divider at the top of the list.
sortAscendingButton false java.lang.String Selector used to find the sort-ascending button for this list.
sortDescendingButton false java.lang.String Selector used to find the sort-descending button for this list.
pullToRefresh false java.lang.String Function name to call when the user pulls down on the list to refresh it.
pushToRefresh false java.lang.String Function name to call when the user pushes down on the list bottom to get more items.
customPaginatorTemplate false java.lang.String Function name to call as the components of the paginator are rendered.
autodividers false java.lang.Boolean false Indicates if jquery auto-dividers ares going to be used in this list
autodividersSelectorCallback false java.lang.String Function to invoke on a row to get the section name in a list with auto dividers.
noSelectOnPagination false java.lang.Boolean false Indicates that paginating back or forward should not trigger the first item on the new page to be selected.
showButtons false java.lang.Boolean true Indicates that sort buttons are displayed.
buttonPos false java.lang.String left Set to left to render sort and filter buttons on the left. Set to right to render them on the right.
showDataIcon false java.lang.Boolean true Indicates that the arrow icon (right side) is displayed in list items.
multiSelect false java.lang.Boolean false Enable multi select of list items.
